SELECT POST_NO,
POST_TITLE, MEMBER_NO, READ_COUNT, CREATE_DATE FROM CIRCLE C
JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE C.STATUS = 'N' AND M.STATUS ='N' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO CIRCLE(BOARD_NO,POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_NO) VALUES(10,SEQ_CIRNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE CIRCLE SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT +1 WHERE POST_NO = ? AND STATUS ='N'

SELECT POST_NO, POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_NO
FROM CIRCLE C
JOIN MEMBER M USING (MEMBER_NO) WHERE POST_NO=? AND C.STATUS='N' AND M.STATUS='N'
UPDATE CIRCLE SET POST_TITLE = ?, POST_CONTENT = ? WHERE POST_NO = ?
